Package topdown

Holds the package that is the primary code for the 2D Shooter game.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BufferImageLoader
    Class to be used to work with sprites for in-game models.
    Bullet
    Class used to create bullets within the Game.
    ControlsMenu
    Class used to display the controls menu.
    Credits
    Class used to display the Credits submenu.
    Enemy
    Class used to determine/set enemy properties before inserting them into the game.
    Game
    Main class which runs the program and holds the most important methods used to keep track of essential game elements/information.
    GameObject
    Abstract class used to monitor and alter the properties of GameObjects.
    GameOverScreen
    Class used to display the Game Over screen.
    GameScreen
    Class used to display the Game screen.
    GameWonScreen
    Class used to display the Game Won screen.
    Handler
    Class used to keep track of all GameObjects and hold their unique properties.
    KeyControls
    Class is used to read keystrokes and let program know if the player should move in a specific direction.
    Menu
    Class is used to render the main menu.
    MouseInput
    Class used to read mouseInput from the user.
    OptionsMenu
    Class is used to display the options menu.
    PauseMenu
    Class used to display the pause menu.
    Player
    Class used to create the player GameObject and alter its properties.
    SecondTimer
    Creates a timer to count down time that is left in the game.
    Wall
    Creates a wall to be used as a way to block movement in-game.
    Window
    Used to create a window for the game screen to be played in.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    State
    Creates the different states available to be used to say what state the game currently is in.
    Type
    Creates the different types of objects available to be made in the game.

Package topdown Description

Holds the package that is the primary code for the 2D Shooter game.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Isaac Jimenez, Nicholas English, Suman Gurung
